channel.title: SQL Integrating Issue
channel.description:
Okay, so basically, I tried integrating my server with my vBulletin using [URL=http://"http://forums.havenworld.co.uk/index.php?topic=1850.0]this tutorial[/URL]. It all went smoothly, and I have NO compiling errors, but when I try to run my server, it says ERROR 1........
Then if I try to log in to the server, no matter what, it always says invalid username or password. If anyone can help that'd be great!
